column4: its me again, it seem that since ive erased the swap partition i dont have enough space in my ubuntu 11 partition. how can that be?
it can't be, you've done something else
first i erased wicd, then i mess with gpart and erased my two swap partition
one partition that i already had with ubuntu 11 , and another that was created when i installed BT5
when i boot in safe mode, i cant get the graphic mode to work, just console
maybe you should hide in your fallout shelter, then
my problem is that i cant get to ubuntu 11, the screen is just black and with the following message> disconected from plyouth
thisis my problem, when i get to grub i choose ubuntu11 and then after a while i cant get to the graphic mode, just black screen with a message about disconnectec from plymouth
should a dpkg restore help me_
